metadata.name: The Duo
metadata.description:
"The Duo" is a hand-painted fashion illustration developed for the MARRISA WILSON New York Spring/Summer ‘23 Runway Collection, “Of Many Waters," which will debut on the NYFW Runway on September 11th, 2022.

The auction for "The Duo" will launch as the models walk down the runway wearing the physical representation of the styles depicted within the illustration itself. This artwork and design will be featured within the NYFW.com livestream of the show, making this the first-ever collection of fashion illustrations released as a digital art series in conjunction with a NYFW Runway Show - a historic moment for fashion in Web3.

"The Duo" will be Look 28 and Look 29 in the MARRISA WILSON New York Spring/Summer '23 Runway Collection, and one of five pieces in the MW Genesis NYFW Fashion Illustration Series. Collectors will receive a framed print of their illustration and will be entered into a raffle to receive another hand-painted illustration featured in the NYFW Runway Show for free.
